File libsrc/libmath/get_regional.c

Public Functions

get_regional 
 void get_regional(CrustModel *crust,
                   const char *phase,
                   double depth,
                   int *npts,
                   float *t,
                   float *d)
Compute the regional travel times and derivative for a crust model.

Parameters:
crust - Input CrustModel.
phase - Input phase name.
depth - Input depth in kilometers.
npts - Output number of times computed.
t - Output travel time values. t must hold up tp 400 values.
d - Output distance values (degrees). d must hold up tp 400 values.
